item.description:
This is a very big event. There are fly in procedures here as well.. We can go check out this event and see if we need to tweak ours.... Any takers???

Charley


Event Name: 25th Annual Simsbury Flyin and Car Show
Event Location: Simsbury, CT
Event Date: September 19, 2010
Contact Name: Bill Thomas
Contact Phone: 860-693-4550
Additional Comments: The largest event of its kind in New England, featuring displays of hundreds of beautiful airplanes and autos. Skydiving and formation flying demos, many dealer displays, flybys, seminars, live music, kids activities, breakfast and lunch. Great venue for families. Parking on and near airport. No admission, but donation would be appreciated.

http://www.simsburyai...

http://www.simsburyai...
http://www.simsburyai...
